${ModID}:NeuroDogRelic.NAME: Neuro Dog
${ModID}:NeuroDogRelic.FLAVOR: Solo built robot quadruped to provide an AI streamer a physical body.
DESCRIPTIONS: Work on Neuro Dog at #yRest #ySites #b%d times to finish building her. NL Current Stage: #bDesign
Work on Neuro Dog at #yRest #ySites #b%d times to finish building her. NL Current Stage: #bAssemble
Work on Neuro Dog at #yRest #ySites #b%d times to finish building her. NL Current Stage: #bReduce #bLatency
Neuro Dog is summoned as an ally at the start of each combat. There is a #b%d% chance enemies will target Neuro instead of the player.
